subject: Playoff Games
Basketball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Golden State is two victories from eliminating the Mavericks, who had the N.B.A.’s best record. Yet Warriors coach Don Nelson insists his team has been lucky.
snippet: Golden State is two victories from eliminating the Mavericks, who had the N.B.A.’s best record. Yet Warriors coach Don Nelson insists his team has been lucky.
